name: ical-to-csv
title: iCal to CSV Converter
description: Convert iCalendar (.ics) calendar files to CSV spreadsheet format
content:
Overview

This application converts iCalendar (.ics) files to CSV format using the icalendar library. Extract calendar events with all metadata into a spreadsheet-friendly format for analysis and reporting.

Features

  • Extract all event details (summary, description, location, etc.)
  • Parse start/end dates and times
  • Include attendees, organizers, and categories
  • Extract URLs and UIDs
  • Capture created and modified timestamps

CSV Output Columns

  • Summary, Description, Location, Status
  • Start/End Date, Time, and DateTime
  • Organizer, Attendees, Categories
  • URL, UID, Created, Last Modified

Parameters

  • Input Calendar File: Upload your .ics file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the CSV output

Output

The application generates a CSV file named {original_name}.csv with all calendar events in spreadsheet format.

Use Cases

  • Analyze calendar data in spreadsheet applications
  • Export Google Calendar or Outlook events
  • Generate reports from event data
  • Migrate calendar data between systems
  • Archive event history
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python "$REPO_DIR/python/ical_to_csv.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
